what: Simulated Causal Datasets for Investment Management
title: Simulated Causal Datasets for Investment Management
text: Simulated datasets causal inference institutional investment management. CausalInvestData provides realistic, structured datasets help researchers analysts test causal inference methods matching, propensity score weighting, causal forests, time-series modeling financial context.

title: Simulated Causal Datasets for Investment Management
text: fund_performance ‚Äì treatment effect mutual fund returns portfolio_allocations ‚Äì allocation strategy vs.¬†performance client_behavior ‚Äì client churn advisory treatment simulation macro_shocks ‚Äì macroeconomic variables affecting asset prices

title: Simulated Causal Datasets for Investment Management
Simulated Causal Datasets for Investment Management
code: library(CausalInvestData) data(fund_performance) head(fund_performance)  # Estimate treatment effect using matching library(MatchIt) m.out <- matchit(treatment ~ market_return + alpha + beta, data = fund_performance) summary(m.out)

title: Simulated Client Behavior Data ‚Äî client_behavior

title: Simulated Portfolio Allocation Data ‚Äî portfolio_allocations
text: data frame 500 observations 5 variables: portfolio_id Unique identifier risk_level Risk profile: Low, Medium, High equity_allocation Proportion allocated equities bond_allocation Proportion allocated bonds treatment Indicator allocation policy treatment return Observed return
